typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		SalesOrderDetailID as integer,
		OrderQty as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		UnitPriceDiscount as decimal(19,4),
		LineTotal as decimal(38,6),
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SQLTablesSource
SQLTablesSource split(UnitPrice >= 1 && UnitPrice <= 100,
	UnitPrice >= 101 && UnitPrice <=200,
	UnitPrice >= 201 && UnitPrice <= 300,
	UnitPrice >= 301 && UnitPrice <= 1000,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(UnitPrice100, UnitPrice200, UnitPrice300, UnitPrice1000, OtherSales)
ConditionalSplit1@UnitPrice100 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink100
ConditionalSplit1@UnitPrice200 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink200
ConditionalSplit1@UnitPrice300 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink300
ConditionalSplit1@UnitPrice1000 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1000
ConditionalSplit1@OtherSales sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkothers
